TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmFunctionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmFunctionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 一个特性，当该特性应用于某方法时，指示该方法是概念模型或存储模型中某个函数的代理。

span.span: An attribute that, when applied to a method, indicates that the method is a proxy for a function in the conceptual model or storage model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将公共语言运行时 (CLR) 方法链接到另一个函数。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 例如, 属性可用于将 CLR 方法映射到由存储提供程序公开的函数、数据库中的用户定义函数或概念模型中的用户定义函数。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. 可以从 LINQ to Entities 查询调用具有此属性的方法。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用将 CLR 方法映射到函数, 则必须满足以下条件:To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的返回类型必须与映射到函数的返回类型兼容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的参数类型必须与映射到函数的参数类型兼容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 有关兼容的类型的信息, 请参阅[概念模型类型 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).

Public Sub New (namespaceName As String, functionName As String)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: namespaceName
param.span: 映射目标函数的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将公共语言运行时 (CLR) 方法链接到另一个函数。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 例如, 属性可用于将 CLR 方法映射到由存储提供程序公开的函数、数据库中的用户定义函数或概念模型中的用户定义函数。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. 可以从 LINQ to Entities 查询调用具有此属性的方法。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用将 CLR 方法映射到函数, 则必须满足以下条件:To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的返回类型必须与映射到函数的返回类型兼容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的参数类型必须与映射到函数的参数类型兼容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 有关兼容的类型的信息, 请参阅[概念模型类型 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).
